diagnoses: F33.1 MAJOR DEPRESSIVE DISORDER, RECURRENT, MODERATE

med_management_notes.history_of_present_illness: States he had clots removed and vein is cleared out. 'My heart doctor is really happy. I have no clots.' States anxiety is 'down for me. It's down a lot.' States he and his service dog are happy again. Client started painting again. 'Things are going good.'
